parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post does not contain a CMF number.  While the absence of a CMF number is not definitive proof that the post is not electoral propaganda, it is a factor to consider.  The lack of a CMF suggests it might not be officially sanctioned campaign material.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post refers to "Manolache Vasile Senator". While it doesn't explicitly mention a specific party, the page name and hashtags strongly suggest it's promoting Manolache Vasile's candidacy for Senator. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The use of hashtags further amplifies its reach beyond personal communication. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The post's core message encourages voters to support Manolache Vasile on December 1st.  Phrases like "momentul să demonstrăm că schimbarea este posibilă," "votăm pentru o România mai bună," and "lideri care prețuiesc oamenii" clearly aim to influence voting behavior. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it focuses on promoting a specific candidate and their vision.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a carefully crafted message designed to persuade voters. The use of promotional hashtags and a paid advertisement format further reinforces this.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1740795043387919</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by Momentum Motion Pictures SRL, promotes Manolache Vasile's candidacy for Senator.  The post's content, including calls to action and positive framing of the candidate, directly aims to influence voters. The hashtags and paid advertisement format indicate an intention to reach a wide audience. While lacking a CMF number, the other elements strongly suggest this is electoral propaganda. The post's end date (1732867200) corresponds to November 23rd, 2024, which is after the official end of the electoral campaign period.  This makes the post a clear violation of Article 98 t).
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Manolache Vasile</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Momentum Motion Pictures SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 1740795043387919) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura lui Manolache Vasile la Senat, folosind mesaje persuasive și apeluri la vot, având un efect electoral pozitiv asupra candidaturii sale. Postarea, plătită cu o sumă sub 100 RON, a atins o audiență estimată între 100.000 și 500.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Conținutul postării, inclusiv hashtag-urile #ManolacheVasileSenator, #SchimbarePentruOameni, #VotulContează, #RomâniaMaiBună, demonstrează clar intenția de a influența votul în favoarea candidatului.  Contactul Momentum Motion Pictures SRL este disponibil la contact@momentum.com.ro și +40767277777.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
